text: The Killers () is a 1956 Soviet movie directed by Marika Beiku, Aleksandr Gordon and Andrei Tarkovsky.Семь грехов студенческого киноУбийцы It stars Yuli Fait, Aleksandr Gordon, and Valentin Vinogradov. The movie is an adaptation of a short story by Ernest Hemingway. ==Actors== * Yuli Fait as Nick Adams * Aleksandr Gordon as George * Valentin Vinogradov as Al * Vadim Novikov as Max * Yuri Dubrovin as 1st Customer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1956 movies Category:Movies directed by Andrei Tarkovsky
title: The Killers (1956 movie)
